md:
giải nghĩa từ "delegation" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Delegation (noun) - Ủy quyền
	+ Meaning: The act of giving someone the authority to make decisions or take actions on behalf of another person or organization.
	+ Example: The manager gave a delegation to her assistant to sign the contract on her behalf.
	+ Related words: authority, power, responsibility, representative

* Delegation (noun) - Đoàn đại biểu
	+ Meaning: A group of people chosen to represent a country, organization, or group at a meeting or conference.
	+ Example: The delegation from Vietnam attended the international conference on climate change.
	+ Related words: representative, team, group, embassy

* Delegate (verb) - Ủy quyền
	+ Meaning: To give someone the authority to make decisions or take actions on behalf of another person or organization.
	+ Example: The CEO delegated the task of managing the project to her team leader.
	+ Related words: assign, authorize, empower, entrust

* Delegate (noun) - Đại biểu
	+ Meaning: A person chosen to represent a country, organization, or group at a meeting or conference.
	+ Example: The delegate from the United States spoke at the UN General Assembly.
	+ Related words: representative, ambassador, envoy, spokesperson
html:
giải nghĩa từ "delegation" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  • Delegation (noun) - Ủy quyền

    • Meaning: The act of giving someone the authority to make decisions or take actions on behalf of another person or organization.
    • Example: The manager gave a delegation to her assistant to sign the contract on her behalf.
    • Related words: authority, power, responsibility, representative

  • Delegation (noun) - Đoàn đại biểu

    • Meaning: A group of people chosen to represent a country, organization, or group at a meeting or conference.
    • Example: The delegation from Vietnam attended the international conference on climate change.
    • Related words: representative, team, group, embassy

  • Delegate (verb) - Ủy quyền

    • Meaning: To give someone the authority to make decisions or take actions on behalf of another person or organization.
    • Example: The CEO delegated the task of managing the project to her team leader.
    • Related words: assign, authorize, empower, entrust

  • Delegate (noun) - Đại biểu

    • Meaning: A person chosen to represent a country, organization, or group at a meeting or conference.
    • Example: The delegate from the United States spoke at the UN General Assembly.
    • Related words: representative, ambassador, envoy, spokesperson
